meanings.definition: The quality or state of being wild, uncontrollable, or destructive.
meanings.sent1: The rampageousness of the storm caused widespread damage.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper had to contain the rampageousness of the escaped animals.
meanings.sent3: The children's excitement reached a level of rampageousness during the birthday party.
meanings.sent4: The rampageousness of the wildfire left a trail of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The rampageousness of the toddler's tantrum was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The act of engaging in violent or aggressive behavior.
meanings.sent1: The rampageousness of the protestors led to chaos in the streets.
meanings.sent2: The soldier's rampageousness in battle was unmatched.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's playful rampageousness was adorable to watch.
meanings.sent4: The rampageousness of the competitors in the race was fierce.
meanings.sent5: The rampageousness of the bull in the arena was a thrilling spectacle.
